H0.text: Dying is what a tree is when it is dormant.

H1.text: Inactive is the state of a tree when it is dormant.

H2.text: Growing taller is what the tree does when it is dormant.

H3.text: Growing its leaves is what a tree does when it is dormant.

A4.text: Dormancy is a period in an organism's life cycle when growth, development, and (in animals) physical activity are temporarily stopped.

A5.text: In plant physiology, dormancy is a period of arrested plant growth.
